algorithms.imageProcessing

Class IntensityFeatures

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.IntensityFeatures
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Features

    public class IntensityFeatures
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    nichole

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int bHalfW
      the half width of a block.
      protected Image clrImg
      either gsImg or clrImg will be set by the constructor and they are the grey scale image or the color image, respectively.
      protected GreyscaleImage gsImg
      either gsImg or clrImg will be set by the constructor and they are the grey scale image or the color image, respectively.
      protected java.util.Map<PairInt,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,IntensityDescriptor>> intensityBlocks
      key = pixel coordinates of center of frame; value = map with key = rotation (in degrees) of the frame and value = the extracted descriptor
      protected boolean useBinnedCellIntensities 
      protected boolean useNormalizedIntensities 
      protected float[][] xyOffsets

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FeatureComparisonStat calculateIntensityStat(IDescriptor desc1, int x1, int y1, IDescriptor desc2, int x2, int y2)
      calculate the intensity based statistic (SSD) between the two descriptors with the caveat that the 2nd descriptor is the one used to calculate the error (so make sure that pattern is consistently used by invoker).
      static FeatureComparisonStat calculateStats(IntensityDescriptor descIntensity1, int x1, int y1, IntensityDescriptor descIntensity2, int x2, int y2)
      calculate the intensity and gradient based statistics between the two descriptors with the caveat that the 2nd descriptor is the one used to calculate the error (so make sure that pattern is consistently used by invoker).
      protected void checkBounds(int x, int y) 
      protected IntensityDescriptor extractClrIntensityForBlock(int xCenter, int yCenter, float[][] offsets)
      extract the intensity from the image and place in the descriptor.
      protected IntensityDescriptor extractClrIntensityForCells(int xCenter, int yCenter, int rotation)
      extract the intensity from the image in 2X2 cells surrounding (xCenter, yCenter) for 16 cells.
      protected IntensityDescriptor extractGsIntensityForBlock(int xCenter, int yCenter, float[][] offsets)
      extract the intensity from the image and place in the descriptor.
      protected IntensityDescriptor extractGsIntensityForCells(int xCenter, int yCenter, int rotation)
      extract the intensity from the image in 2X2 cells surrounding (xCenter, yCenter) for 16 cells.
      IntensityDescriptor extractIntensity(int xCenter, int yCenter, int rotation)
      extract the intensity from the image for the given block center and return it in a descriptor.

    • Field Detail

      • clrImg

        protected final Image clrImg
        either gsImg or clrImg will be set by the constructor and they are the grey scale image or the color image, respectively.

      • gsImg

        protected final GreyscaleImage gsImg
        either gsImg or clrImg will be set by the constructor and they are the grey scale image or the color image, respectively.

      • bHalfW

        protected final int bHalfW
        the half width of a block. For example, to extract the 25 pixels centered on (xc, yc), bHalfW would be '2'. a minimum of 5 seems to be necessary.

      • xyOffsets

        protected final float[][] xyOffsets

      • useNormalizedIntensities

        protected final boolean useNormalizedIntensities

      • useBinnedCellIntensities

        protected final boolean useBinnedCellIntensities
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • intensityBlocks

        protected java.util.Map<PairInt,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,IntensityDescriptor>> intensityBlocks
        key = pixel coordinates of center of frame; value = map with key = rotation (in degrees) of the frame and value = the extracted descriptor

      • extractIntensity

        public IntensityDescriptor extractIntensity(int xCenter,
                                            int yCenter,
                                            int rotation)
        extract the intensity from the image for the given block center and return it in a descriptor.
        Parameters:
        xCenter -
        yCenter -
        rotation - dominant orientation in degrees for feature at (xCenter, yCenter)
        Returns:

                                                           int x1,

                                                           IDescriptor desc2,
                                                           int x2,
                                                           int y2)
        calculate the intensity based statistic (SSD) between the two descriptors with the caveat that the 2nd descriptor is the one used to calculate the error (so make sure that pattern is consistently used by invoker).
        Parameters:

        x1 -
        y1 -
        desc2 -
        x2 -
        y2 -
        Returns:

      • extractGsIntensityForBlock

        protected IntensityDescriptor extractGsIntensityForBlock(int xCenter,
                                                         int yCenter,
                                                         float[][] offsets)
        extract the intensity from the image and place in the descriptor. Note that if the transformed pixel is out of bounds of the image, a sentinel is the value for that location in the descriptor.
        Parameters:
        xCenter -
        yCenter -
        Returns:
